column2: "For  the  benefit  of  the  trial  Judges  and  the  legal  practitioners  of  this  country,  we  make  the
following guidelines as to how the evidence given by an accused person should be evaluated.
If the evidence of the accused is believed by Court, it must be acted upon.
If  the evidence  of the  accused  raises  a  reasonable doubt  in  the prosecution  case,
the defence of the accused must succeed.
